video.title: Animal House
video.synopsis: The dedicated dog lovers at North Shore Animal League, the largest no-kill animal shelter in America, work hard to save abandoned and injured dogs.

episodes.synopsis: A rescue organization tries to help Sparkplug, a gentle Dalmatian who has been abandoned on their doorstep but must be transferred to a local pound.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A recently evicted woman surrenders her beloved dog, Shorty, to North Shore Animal League, and the vets treat a rescue dog struggling with pneumonia.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: League workers head to Florida to aid dogs left homeless by recent hurricanes, and a campaign begins to help Sparkplug find a home despite her age.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Three-legged dog Trevor, left homeless after Florida's latest hurricane, is prepped by the League's devoted staff for an upcoming adoption event.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Young Charley is paralyzed by parvo, but his nurse is determined to help him walk again. Another pup is given to the League and assessed for adoption.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The League must tame and groom Shooter, a wild dog discovered in a junkyard in the Bronx, so that he may graduate from junkyard dog to family pet.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Two dogs are surrendered to the League's Adoption Return department, while an undernourished mother dog and her five pups are given intensive care.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: A stray and her eight puppies are evaluated for adoption, with the League workers hoping that they can rehabilitate the wild mother.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Sadie will need therapy and an extra dose of TLC to overcome the trauma of an abusive owner. Fortunately, the League's staff is ready to help.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The team works to save Cuddles, a scruffy terrier mix who was hit by a car and can no longer walk, and Heather, a dog with a behavior problem.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A neglected dog dumped at the League must be socialized before she can be adopted, but her deep-rooted fear of men challenges the trainers.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: It's tough love for teenager Kevin and his misbehaving pooch Cujo, who will be separated if they don't take their obedience lessons seriously.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The dedicated workers at the League are tested when a snowstorm keeps away potential adopters, forcing them to put in long hours to care for the dogs.
episodes.title: Episode 13
